title: Cosmic Odyssey
description: A journey to the edge of the galaxy reveals a secret that will change humanity forever. A team of astronauts must confront their own fears and the vast emptiness of space.

title: The Last Heist
description: A retired master thief is forced back into the game for one last job. But this time, the stakes are personal, and betrayal lurks around every corner.

title: Echoes of Yesterday
description: Two childhood sweethearts reconnect after twenty years, only to find that their pasts have shaped them in ways they never could have imagined. A tale of love, loss, and second chances.

title: Cyber Revolt
description: In a future dominated by AI, a small group of rebels fights to reclaim human autonomy. Their leader, a gifted hacker, is the world's last hope.

title: Beneath the Surface
description: A deep-sea exploration mission goes horribly wrong when the crew awakens a dormant creature from the abyss. Trapped miles below the ocean, they must fight for survival.

title: The Gilded Cage
description: The mysterious death of a wealthy patriarch throws a dysfunctional family into chaos, revealing a web of secrets, lies, and deceit.

title: Symphony of Stars
description: In a world where music is magic, a young prodigy must compose a legendary symphony to save her kingdom from an encroaching silence that consumes all.

title: Midnight Run
description: A bounty hunter is tasked with bringing a sensitive accountant to L.A., but the FBI, the mob, and a rival bounty hunter have other plans.

title: Zero Gravity
description: An explosion leaves two astronauts stranded in deep space, tethered to nothing but each other and spiraling out into the darkness.

title: The Laughing Man
description: A struggling stand-up comedian finds unexpected fame but loses himself in the process. A poignant look at the price of success.

title: Realm of Shadows
description: A cursed knight must venture into a land of perpetual darkness to lift a plague that has befallen his people, confronting twisted creatures and his own inner demons.

title: Summer in Rome
description: An American tourist finds unexpected love with a charming local artist during a whirlwind summer in the Eternal City.

title: The Conduit
description: A journalist uncovers a vast government conspiracy after receiving a cryptic message from a whistleblower, putting her life in grave danger.

title: Nomad's Land
description: After losing everything in the Great Recession, a woman embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

title: Project Chimera
description: A soldier enhanced with illegal cybernetics goes rogue to expose the corrupt corporation that created him.

title: The Witching Hour
description: A coven of witches in modern-day Salem must protect their secrets and their lives from a new wave of witch hunters.

title: Lost in Translation
description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

title: The Silent Patient
description: A psychotherapist becomes obsessed with unraveling the mystery of his famous patient who has gone silent after murdering her husband.

title: Forged in Fire
description: A disgraced blacksmith discovers he is the last in a line of dragon-slayers and must forge a legendary weapon to stop an ancient evil.

title: Ocean of Lies
description: A woman's perfect life unravels after she discovers her husband's devastating secret while on a luxury cruise.

title: Quantum Leap
description: A physicist tests his time-travel machine and leaps into the past, finding himself in different people's lives and altering history for the better.

title: City of Ghosts
description: A paranormal investigator moves into a haunted apartment building in New Orleans to uncover the truth behind a century-old curse.

title: The King's Gambit
description: The story of a brilliant but troubled chess prodigy who rises to the top of the world of competitive chess during the Cold War.

title: Velvet Blades
description: An elite all-female spy syndicate takes on a shadowy organization threatening to destabilize global politics.

title: Aurora's Song
description: A mortal man falls in love with a celestial being who visits his village, but their love is forbidden by the ancient laws of the cosmos.

title: No Man's Land
description: During World War I, two young British soldiers are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop 1,600 men, and one of the soldier's brothers, from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: The Comedian
description: An aging comic icon, tries to reinvent himself - and his comic genius - in a world that has passed him by.

title: Synthetic Dreams
description: In a near-future where androids are indistinguishable from humans, a detective falls in love with a synthetic being he knows is designed to deceive him.

title: Whispers in the Dark
description: A family moves into a new home, only to be tormented by a malevolent spirit that communicates through whispers.

title: The Cartographer
description: A young apprentice discovers a magical map that reveals uncharted lands, embarking on an adventure to chart them and uncover their secrets.

title: Sunset Boulevard
description: A screenwriter is hired to rework a faded silent film star's script, only to find himself trapped in her fantasy world.

title: The Prodigy
description: A mother concerned about her young son's disturbing behavior thinks something supernatural may be affecting him.

title: Crimson Peak
description: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider.

title: Apex Predator
description: A group of elite soldiers on a rescue mission find themselves hunted by a genetically engineered creature on a remote island.

title: The Locksmith
description: An expert locksmith, fresh out of prison, tries to work his way back into the life of his daughter and ex-fiancé, but is forced to use his skills for a final, dangerous job.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

title: The Alchemist
description: An Andalusian shepherd boy named Santiago travels from his homeland in Spain to the Egyptian desert in search of a treasure buried near the Pyramids.

title: Paper Moon
description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Lighthouse
description: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

title: Her
description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an advanced operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Drive
description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

title: The Social Network
description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Children of Men
description: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have somehow become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: The Matrix
description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: Alien
description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

title: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Chronos Archive
description: A historian discovers a hidden archive of temporal anomalies, forcing her to piece together a fragmented history to prevent a catastrophic future.
